Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board

Class ResourcesStock

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.ResourcesStock
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceSpot
public class ResourcesStock
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceSpot
The class represents a summary of the total number of resources a player owns in order to make faster the access to these quantity and improve the performances of actions involving checks/counts about resources
